synopsis.text:
To forge their own paths and hone their unique abilities, Aladdin, Alibaba, and Morgiana embark on separate journeys following their triumphant victory against Al-Thamen and a joyous celebration in Sindria. Aladdin seeks the enigmatic realm of Magnostadt, governed by powerful magicians, to delve deeper into the mysterious occurrences unfolding within this kingdom and bolster his magical prowess. Meanwhile, Hakuryuu and Kougyoku return to their homeland, the Kou Empire, under royal orders.

Inspired by Aladdin's encouraging words, Alibaba and Morgiana pursue their individual aspirations: Alibaba sets out for rigorous training, while Morgiana makes her way to her native land. As these friends venture forth, they encounter distinct challenges and form new alliances. However, whispers of an impending great war cast a dark shadow over their separate adventures, hinting at the rise of a new threat. Magi: The Kingdom of Magic chronicles their personal growth and the trials they face in this exciting new chapter.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
